title: Dine-In Kitchen Islands*, Balconies and Terraces*, Bike Repair Shop
posting_body: At The Grant, coming home feels like you're on vacation.

With impressive resort-style amenities like an expansive rooftop swimming pool with unobstructed views of Mount Diablo and a state-of-the-art fitness center, it is possible to live beyond your expectations.
The elegant, curated interiors include high-end finishes like kitchens and baths with quartz countertops, plank flooring, and stainless-steel appliances.
Surrounded by your favorite shops, restaurants, and easy access to Concord’s BART station, a vibrant new lifestyle awaits at this perfect location.
Use this link for more details:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 553 Sq.
- Custom Cabinetry in Kitchen and Bath
- Luxury Vinyl Tile Flooring in Living, Dining, & Kitchen
- Electronic Unit Entry Locks with Card/FOB/App Access
- Quartz Countertops in Kitchen and Baths
- Smart TV for On-Demand Workout Connectivity
- On-site parking garage with direct access to every floor
- Clubroom with High-End Finishes and Luxurious Fireplace
- Outdoor Grills and Dining Area Perfect for Entertaining
- Bike Storage in On-Site Parking Structure
- Resort-style Pool With Cabanas and Mt. Diablo View
- Storage with and without Climate Control
Two pets maximum per apartment home.
All pets must be registered with the leasing office and on the lease.
We do not accept aggressive breeds.
